page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The main employment in Eastnor is a {woodyard,a light engineering firm}and an estate office for Eastnor Castle, which manages the maintenance of all the estate houses and farms.The main occupation for the villagers is farming on the eight village farms. Other villagers travel to the nearby market town of Ledbury for employment. Six people work at the woodyard, it is situated on the corner of the main road by the castle lodge.They cut trees from the local woods and it is sold to nearby localities. There is a privately owned old peoples' home which employs ten people.The post office employs two people.Two homes in the village do bed and breakfast,and the castle employs several cleaners. The school has two teaching staff and four ancillary staff.
